channel.title: Very Simple Yet Effective Button Tut
channel.description:
2nd Gfx Tut ;)
in this tutorial i will be showing you how to make a cool looking button. end result: [img]http://www.auto-rune.co.uk/images/butonend.gif[/img]
[b]step one[/b]: make a new one with width: 130 | hight: 60 . [b]step two[/b]: use this [img]http://www.adobetutorialz.com/content_images/AdobePhotoshop/ART-D/Tools/EllipseTool.gif[/img] and draw a circle it should look somthing like this: [img]http://www.auto-rune.co.uk/images/buttonstep1.gif[/img] now at the top change the style to "[b]Chisled Sky[/b]" and your done. you can use this on your website for navigation ;) ect....
this isnt that hard to do so i dont take credits for it ;)

item.description:
@kaza wrote:

I would put one of my own gradients, maybe a border, and definatly a drop shadow underneath it, otherwise, it’s okay for a simple button ;D.
